__e: You think revenge is gonna make Caleb feel better about seeing his brother die?
The brother's death was an accident, but it sounds like Caleb blames himself for it.
Listen... if Caleb comes near you again, I want you to tell me or you tell your mom, okay?
Caleb, I had no idea when you'd come back or if you'd ever come back.
Well, if Caleb's not my dad, what else can I do?
The difference is Caleb's not marrying your daughter, I am.
You're going to feel a whole lot more than anger if anything happens to Caleb and my friends.
Actually, everything that's happened with Caleb and me I think it's best I stay home. Avoid this holiday.

Look, I know things haven't been very easy around here, everything with Caleb and your father leaving, but this is the only family we have, and I really want it to work, and not just for the photo shoot.
